term.name: materialism
term.source: From Latin materialis: relating to matter.
term.def: The view that fundamentally only matter exists. Materialism is opposed to metaphysical &idealism; and considers any talk of consciousness or the soul to be a throwback to the bad old days of &spiritualism; and &vitalism;. Because materialists generally assert that matter can be known completely in terms of physical laws (see &reductionism;), they often lend theoretical support to &determinism;.
